Master of Deepwood Motte05279h62pnuj146df4khf983qetwbx5op2t11492312014-06-26T22:20:15ZCorneliusAgrippa5753603'''Master of Deepwood Motte''' is a title held by the ruler of the castle of [[Deepwood Motte]] and its surrounding lands in [[the North]], located along the [[Bay of Ice]] and extending into the [[Wolfswood]]. The title is traditionally held by a member of [[House Glover]], vassals of [[House Stark]] (and latterly [[House Bolton]]). The current Master is [[Galbart Glover]].
